$interpreted:
Seasoned Illegal Miner: Huff... Puff...
This Bear sure is tough as nails...

Dagger: I've been noticing for a while now; something's not right with you people. 
Far too skilled in combat for mere miners.
Dagger: More soldier than miner, if I were to guess.
Seasoned Illegal Miner: Who we are is none of your concern. You're not leaving here alive anyway!
Dagger: You really think you can kill me with such lousy moves? You guys...
Puggi: PANG~ I miss you so much!
Puggi: Sniff sniff Pang do you miss me my god why have you gotten fat again in the few days I'm gone did you stuff your face with food again
Puggi: that's no good and your newly-dyed hair looks ugly as hell even though your old style wasn't much better...
Puggi: Bro, who the heck are you?
Dagger: That was my question!

Puggi: I don't know either!
I remember telling my summon that the person I'm looking for is,
Puggi: someone who has long hair, is very muscular and has an "Everyone owes me money" kind of grumpy face...
Puggi: Whoops, I guess there's a second person that matches that exact description?
Dagger: Get lost! You want me to rip those wings off for lunch?
Puggi: A, absolutely not sir. Since it's a misunderstanding, I shall leave you boys alone. Have fun~
Newlywed Illegal Miner: Bad news boss, the hidden mining location we found last time has been exposed. On top of it, our men have been...

Newlywed Illegal Miner: You stinkin bird again!
He's the one who ruined our business!

Seasoned Illegal Miner: So you two are on the same side?
Then we'll kill both of you!
Puggi: Tch, why is it that everywhere I go I encounter bloodshed? Is this part of the hardships I have to overcome as the main protagonist?
Dagger: Hey you! Either you fight with me, or get out of the way!

Puggi: Hmm, not too shabby, not too shabby.
You are now qualified to be my minion.

Dagger: What are you blabbering about, croissant head!
I dare you repeat that nonsense again!!
Puggi: No, you have the wrong idea. I just want to recruit you to my team. You can be the black character in the middle that deals damage...

Dagger: Oh fer... Can you say something that actually makes SENSE to me?
Also, just who exactly are you?

Puggi: I am sorry. It's all my fault.
Please forgive me for my big mouth.

Dagger: However, you indeed helped me drive away those humans; should say thank you for that. 
By the way, did you mistake me for someone else?

Puggi: I'm looking for a fella that looks like a big tiger.
His name is Pang; has Sir seen him before?
Dagger: ... A Tiger beast? It's reported from while ago, but some Bears said they saw someone meets your description in Whistlewood Valley.
Dagger: I say you try your luck there.
Puggi: Understood. Thank you, sir. I shall take my leave.

Puggi: Oh, if you suddenly change your mind,
my ranks are always open for...
Dagger: ... I wonder how juicy you be if I slice you in half?

Model.Text:
Huff... Puff...
This Bear sure is tough as nails...

I've been noticing for a while now; something's not right with you people. 
Far too skilled in combat for mere miners.
More soldier than miner, if I were to guess.
Who we are is none of your concern. You're not leaving here alive anyway!
You really think you can kill me with such lousy moves? You guys...
PANG~ I miss you so much!
Sniff sniff Pang do you miss me my god why have you gotten fat again in the few days I'm gone did you stuff your face with food again
that's no good and your newly-dyed hair looks ugly as hell even though your old style wasn't much better...
Bro, who the heck are you?
That was my question!

I don't know either!
I remember telling my summon that the person I'm looking for is,
someone who has long hair, is very muscular and has an "Everyone owes me money" kind of grumpy face...
Whoops, I guess there's a second person that matches that exact description?
Get lost! You want me to rip those wings off for lunch?
A, absolutely not sir. Since it's a misunderstanding, I shall leave you boys alone. Have fun~
Bad news boss, the hidden mining location we found last time has been exposed. On top of it, our men have been...

You stinkin bird again!
He's the one who ruined our business!

So you two are on the same side?
Then we'll kill both of you!
Tch, why is it that everywhere I go I encounter bloodshed? Is this part of the hardships I have to overcome as the main protagonist?
Hey you! Either you fight with me, or get out of the way!

Hmm, not too shabby, not too shabby.
You are now qualified to be my minion.

What are you blabbering about, croissant head!
I dare you repeat that nonsense again!!
No, you have the wrong idea. I just want to recruit you to my team. You can be the black character in the middle that deals damage...

Oh fer... Can you say something that actually makes SENSE to me?
Also, just who exactly are you?

I am sorry. It's all my fault.
Please forgive me for my big mouth.

However, you indeed helped me drive away those humans; should say thank you for that. 
By the way, did you mistake me for someone else?

I'm looking for a fella that looks like a big tiger.
His name is Pang; has Sir seen him before?
... A Tiger beast? It's reported from while ago, but some Bears said they saw someone meets your description in Whistlewood Valley.
I say you try your luck there.
Understood. Thank you, sir. I shall take my leave.

Oh, if you suddenly change your mind,
my ranks are always open for...
... I wonder how juicy you be if I slice you in half?
